name: Pot10n
description:
Needle Tinkertot,  an alchemist-in-training, is finally ready to complete her final exam. Play as Needle as she proves to her Mistress that she's finally ready to be a real alchemist. First, you must choose which potions you must use to overcome her platforming challenges. Then, you must use the potions to fart, hallucinate, shrink, and more, in order to get to the doors. You have to do it fast, though, or else you'll fail the test!

Submission for Ludum Dare 51

Controls

Potion Select: Mouse
A/D - Move Left and Right
S - Use Potion
Spacebar - Jump
